mobi.cyann.deviltools.preference.StatusP.custom:description: Calculate gradient of previous load and actual load.

mobi.cyann.deviltools.preference.Integer.custom:description: Scale up, if gradient is above this value.
Hi-speed to bump to from lo-speed when load burst
Increase Freq above this CPU load
Decrease Freq below this CPU load

mobi.cyann.deviltools.preference.Lulzact.custom:description: Step of max. freq. to be used when screen off. Example: Step 5= only use freq steps 1-5 (200mhz, 300mhz, ..., 600 mhz)

mobi.cyann.deviltools.preference.Integer.custom:description: Sample time to calculate avg_rq and avg_freq for up-scaling
Sample time to calculate avg_rq and avg_freq for down-scaling
max number of online cpus. 0=disabled. priority: hotplug_lock > max_cpu_lock > min_cpu_lock
min number of online cpus. 0=disabled. priority: hotplug_lock > max_cpu_lock > min_cpu_lock
Above this Freq. turn 2nd Cpu online
Below this Freq. turn 2nd Cpu offline
Above this Freq. turn 3rd Cpu online
Below this Freq. turn 3rd Cpu offline
Above this Freq. turn 4th Cpu online
Below this Freq. turn 4th Cpu offline
Above this run queue lengh turn 2nd Cpu online
Below this run queue lengh turn 2nd Cpu offline
Above this run queue lengh turn 3rd Cpu online
Below this run queue lengh turn 3rd Cpu offline
Above this run queue lengh turn 4th Cpu online
Below this run queue lengh turn 4th Cpu offline
Sets hot plug sampling intervals for screen-on state
Fixed number of online cpus. 0=auto-hotplug. priority: hotplug_lock > max_cpu_lock > min_cpu_lock
Above this load, CPU scales up
Below this load, CPU scales down
Time between two samples
Keep x % of idle under the up threshold when decreasing the frequency
how many sampling periods do we use for hotplug decisions (turn cpu on)?
how many sampling periods do we use for hotplug decisions (turn cpu off)?
Increase Freq above this CPU load
Decrease Freq below this CPU load
Sample time to calculate avg_rq and avg_freq for up-scaling
Sample time to calculate avg_rq and avg_freq for down-scaling

mobi.cyann.deviltools.preference.StatusP.custom:description: Calculate gradient of previous load and actual load.

mobi.cyann.deviltools.preference.Integer.custom:description: Scale up, if gradient is above this value.
Scale down, if gradient is below this value.
max number of online cpus. 0=disabled. priority: hotplug_lock > max_cpu_lock > min_cpu_lock
min number of online cpus. 0=disabled. priority: hotplug_lock > max_cpu_lock > min_cpu_lock

Below this Freq. turn 2nd Cpu offline

Below this run queue lengh turn 2nd Cpu offline

Below this run queue lengh turn 4th Cpu offline

Max number of online CPUs while screen off
